name: Duality of Zombie
description:
Oh no! It looks like you're patient zero for a zombie outbreak, and the military is here to exterminate you! However, if you collect all the different colored vials from around town, you may be able to save yourself before it's too late. Switch between being a zombie and a human to complete puzzles around town!

This game was made for Global Game Jam (GGJ) 2022! 

Possible updates in the future, however, no updates until post GGJ Judging!
